title: Job Order/Specification forms
content:
does anyone know of a site that i could reference to create my own job specifications form. i'm looking for information that is pivotal to ask clients (1) to save run-around time and (2) so they have a very, very pristine idea of what is expected. thanx for any suggestions.

L  
(a struggling artist)
author: ls3designs

comments.content: I don't know of any sites, but a very useful book would be, [Graphic Artists Guild Handbook: Pricing & Ethical Guidelines (Graphic Artists Guild Handbook of Pricing and Ethical Guidelines)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193248/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/0932102123/103-8856371-3383808?v=glance&n=283155&n=507846&s=books&v=glance).

The RGD provides many forms, however you will have to adjust the sale tax to reflect your area.

[http://www.rgdontario.com/pubs/handbook.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193248/http:/www.rgdontario.com/pubs/handbook.php "http://www.rgdontario.com/pubs/handbook.php")
